page.title: 12John Blandy School
page.content: The L.E.A. primary school is housed in a modern building dating from 1968. It was extended when two new classrooms were added on to accomodate a rise in the village and child population.It has 150 children at the present time in 5 classes.Over the past few years it has involved parents and villagers in the education of young children.The children are responsible for this survey. The school is partly governed by the John Blandy Trust.This originates in the 17th Century when John Blandy set aside monies for the establishment of a shool for the village children.It has been housed in different buildings.What is now the scout H.Q.was one such building.It had 72 children in 2 classes.Children had to walk to the village hall for their lunch.Toilets were outside.Heat came from coal fires
